column5: Well guys Here is my second video .  Starting to get the hang of this Windows Movie Maker!  Very fun and easy to use on vista!  WE had the best smallie day ever .  landing 5 over 4 lbs  12 over 3lbs.  and one 5 + that won the battke spitting out the jig and trailer right in my cousins face.!  without further a DUE!  Here the video !  Enjoi guys.  i know i did !

Great report and EXCELLENT video Kev I love the way you put this one together    You certainly getting the hang of it eh  Got to love it when the smallies come out to play    Big brutes    loved the slow mo footage!!! AWESOME MAN Paul and I went for musky and didn't even get a sniff     but was a beautiful afternoon we got to spend on the water!!! Again great job you guys and thanks for sharing Jacques
lol sick! we had a bomb ass day too....12 largies/smallies almost all over 3 pounds too...ALL on spinners
Ok, now I'm impressed dude, back to the editing room I go lol  Great job out there, MTBF
Excellent vid Kev!!!  ... you talk funny, boy!!!!
english mixed with quebec sti!  what part arent you understanding .  tell me what you hear and ill translate it!
That was one of the best vids on this board ,I have seen.
Great vid.  Some right nice smallies too. Well done.
Very nice, thanx for sharing!! Me and my fishin' bud haven't had much luck at all lately...Hopefully that will change
Congrats !!!  This has to be one of the best vids I've seen is a long time..... Great work....  Tiz
and the award for best homemade fishing compilation video goes to ...(drummmm rolllllllll.....)someone crazy glued the envelope closed  ........FISHING 24/7 !!!!!!!  your efforts are appreciated!

Best video!  WOW. i didnt expect you guys saying that!  Thanks alot !  these are the two first but not the last!  More 24/7 to come.  With more special invited guessed!  Next week end White spinnerbait will hook into a 4... maybe five pound SMALLIE!  stay tuned!
Great fish, editing job, and video. Yesterday did seem like an ideal fishing day, we haven't had rain and overcast skies in a while, it should only get better from here. Good luck and congrats!
nice! I wish I could say my weekend went as well as yours. cool vid
Nice videos, thanks for sharing...
Sounds like a plan to me.....  My lure of choice will be a Whitespinnerbait.......
Awesome video!!Lots of action and good music! Thanks for taking the time and sharing.
24/7  that video is awesome , good job guys! defenetly jealous ..!
that's funny, I had the best smallie day ever in the river I fished pulled two PB 15" smalleyes out of 4ft of water, something about yesterday, humidity, storm coming. Weird.
That's a great video! Good job on it, and thank you for sharing.
good vid, nice bass, and i love thrice!
beautiful SM! nice video too, you could start ur own fishing show with that! lol. like the slowMo too!

Well believe it or not.  at one point i flipped a rock IN 20 FOW.  and i got a hit ,i set the hook and then he let go at the boat.  I SWEAR TO THE LORD!  6 Smallies were following behind.  i ended up catching one of his friends that was following the crew!  Talk about a feeding frenzy man!!
Thats a fine idea ill catch 90 % of the fish while you film me!  colorado blades + bass in 20 FOW = skunk!
